head.title: How Regression Analysis may be used

body.p: Consider the following three scenarios where relationships between variables are explored:

ol.li: At the end of the semester, an instructor analyzed the data in her grade-book. In particular, the instructor explored how a student’s final score is related to (or can be predicted using) the student’s two midterm scores, the students HW average, and whether or not the student did the extra credit assignment.
A health scientist explored the relationship between a person’s age (X) and whether or not the person gets flu shot (Y)
A study was done in order to explore how well the number of beers a person drinks predicts his or her blood alcohol content
